anchor.Description: Anchor to define where pushes will come from

position.Description: Align your pushes relative to anchor

elementToAppend.Description: DOM element where pushes will be appended, if nothing is defined, pushes will be appended on body

custom.Description: Customize default style properties and other attributes
custom.Valid Values: Parameters specified in Customization section, if nothing is defined, default values will be used for all properties

customIcons.Description: Atibute a name to your icons path here, there is 5 default icons (info, success, warning, error, loading)
